name: Paranoia (itch) (DrManticore)
description:
Something is wrong...

Help guide troubled psychic Sam through their horror-filled nightmate, where fear-induing entities erode at their sanity. Try and reach the exit with your sanity intact, but fear not, as Sam's psychic abilites are fueled by their madness. Less sanity is More power!

Entry for Blackthornprod Game Jam 3
  • Gavmcool - Art, Animation
  • Manti - Code, Additional SFX
  • Tukk - Monster/Level Art & Design
  • Yakka - Music, SFX
Controls

WASD - movement
Space - Use psychic powers
Enter - Interact with objects
